name: Monster Fight
storyline: The monsters are in a world of unknowns. They were hatched by people on the blockchain. They continue to fight and battle in order to grow. The monster's futures will be in the hands of the people. Will they continue their adventure and expand or will they slowly be taken out?
summary: Monster Fight is a play to earn blockchain game. The monsters level up in Adventure and PvP modes. You can apply skills and continue to climb the ranks. Monster Fight uses 3 monsters to play and you can build up those monsters with different skills or level them up to earn more.
